name: Chaos Math
description:
MiniJam 74: Chaos
Limitation: only certain keys permitted for input (A, X, Space, P, 8, B)

Sooo, you waited too long to start studying for that Chaos Theory maths exam, eh? Cramming the night before, and starting to hallucinate, the equations are taunting you, you can hear your professor mocking you, and you seem to have turned into a butterfly....

This game is a SHMUP, but with unusual inputs:

A to Shoot

X to move left, and 8 to move right

P to move up the screen and B to move down

To get out of the loading screen, move the butterfly player off any side of the screen.

(Also, be aware that shooting happens at random angles, with random ammunition, for random scores, and only one kind of ammunition works against each 'enemy')

Voice acting: Enjaku
Art and Coding: Rainsong

Software: Reaper, ct.js, and Affinity Designer
